story_10_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Too bad, my friend! No badge for you today.
Better luck next time!
story_10_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Argh! What gives?
Why can’t I win...
story_10_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Now, now. No use crying over spilled milk.
You have some real strength! 
I can feel it in my bones.
story_10_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmm... I think you just need to believe in
yourself more. With a bit of confidence,
you could be great.
story_10_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Hmm... That girl looks pretty young and little...
Um, excuse me? You wouldn’t happen to be a
PML Leader, would you?
story_10_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
What’s this? Another challenger?
My, my! Business is booming today.
story_10_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Your badge collecting must be going pretty
well if that’s why you’re here.
story_10_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’m flattered you wish to challenge me now,
but to be honest, I’m feeling a wee bit
tired from my last... Huh?
story_10_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Look! It’s more of those mean, masked people!
story_10_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, well! I didn’t expect to find so many
lovely sync pairs here.
story_10_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Today must be my lucky day...
With all of these Pokémon in one place,
I’ll barely have to lift a finger to steal them!
story_10_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Team Break! Ugh, they always pick the worst
times to show up... My Pokémon’s still tired
from that last battle.
story_10_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Don’t worry! You can leave this one to us!
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go!
